techmeme.title: Intel announces the first updates to address Arrow Lake gaming performance issues, fixing four of five root causes, and plans a new update for January (Paul Alcorn/Tom's Hardware)
Source: Perplexity raised $500M led by Institutional Venture Partners at a $9B valuation earlier this month, up from a $3B valuation in June (Shirin Ghaffary/Bloomberg)
Sources: Apple has halted work on a project to build an iPhone hardware subscription service, which had been in development since around 2022 (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
GitHub makes its Copilot free in VS Code, with 2,000 code completions and 50 chat messages per month; GitHub now has 150M developers, up from 100M in early 2023 (Frederic Lardinois/TechCrunch)
OpenAI rolls out a way to talk to ChatGPT by dialing 1-800-CHATGPT for 15 minutes of free access per month in the US or messaging it via WhatsApp globally (Hayden Field/CNBC)
